name: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
description: AWS offers a wide range of GPU instances for various workloads, including machine learning and high-performance computing.
pros: Strong ecosystem and integration with other AWS services
cons: Can be expensive for long-term use

name: Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
description: GCP provides powerful GPU instances with flexible pricing and integration with Google's AI and machine learning tools.
pros: Strong AI and machine learning tools
Good integration with other Google services

name: Microsoft Azure
description: Azure offers a variety of GPU instances suitable for AI, machine learning, and visualization workloads.
cons: Can be expensive for certain workloads

name: IBM Cloud
description: IBM Cloud provides GPU instances optimized for AI and data-intensive workloads, with a focus on enterprise solutions.
pros: Strong focus on AI and data workloads
cons: Limited global presence compared to competitors

name: Oracle Cloud
description: Oracle Cloud offers GPU instances with a focus on high-performance computing and enterprise applications.
cons: Smaller ecosystem compared to AWS and GCP

name: CoreWeave
description: CoreWeave provides cloud GPU solutions optimized for rendering, machine learning, and VFX workloads.
cons: Less known compared to major providers

name: RunPod
description: RunPod offers affordable and scalable GPU cloud solutions for AI and machine learning applications.
cons: Limited features compared to larger providers

name: Vast.ai
description: Vast.ai provides a marketplace for renting GPU compute power, offering competitive pricing and flexibility.
cons: Complexity in choosing the right setup

name: Lambda Labs
description: Lambda Labs offers GPU cloud services tailored for deep learning and AI research.
cons: Limited to AI and ML workloads

name: Fluidstack
description: Fluidstack provides affordable GPU cloud services with a focus on AI and rendering workloads.

name: Genesis Cloud
description: Genesis Cloud offers sustainable and cost-effective GPU cloud solutions for AI and rendering.
cons: Less known compared to major providers
